description.value:
When you feel your faith manifest, you give your mantras life—either vocally or internally—channeling that belief into action.  

Mantras are effects or actions tied to Eikonic Numbers from Cleric Dominions.  Upon rolling an Eikonic Number, all Mantras associated with it are activated at once.  

Choose 2 Mantras to learn from the following list and assign each to your Eikonic Numbers.  

  • Your Awareness and Wisdom (Perception) checks are increased by +5 until the end of your next turn.
  • Your AC increases by +1 until the end of your next turn.
  • You gain +1 on all save checks until the end of your next turn.
  • You can restore up to your Wisdom Modifier worth of temporary hit points distributed amongst creatures within 15 feet of you.
  • You have +1 on skill checks until the end of your next turn.


Learning New Mantras: You learn 1 additional Mantra at each Growth Level.  In addition, you may swap out 1 learned Mantra for another, and further change the Eikonic Number associated with 1 Mantra, at each Growth Level.
Many Cleric Sub-Classes have expanded Mantra options.  Once the unlock requirements for Mantras from that Sub-Class have been met, you are able to choose from that list as well when learning new Mantras. However, unless stated otherwise, Sub-Class Mantras can only be assigned to their corresponding Eikonic Number.

system.requirements: Must have the Cleric Starter Abilities
